description: Development of Powerscope V2 relationship capital management software from scratch to develop a project that meets current technological standards, technical project manager. Implementation and organization of Powerscope project management in the form of Agile cycles.

Contributed to multiple digital projects including the development of a mobile application from scratch as part of a modernization initiative. Developed and maintained features for the Carrefour Location website and the French National Institute of Industrial Property (INPI) Guichet Unique portal. Created a mobile proof of concept (POC) for Citadium.

Conducted research and implementation of SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) within a robotics R&D project. Worked with ROS (Robot Operating System) in simulation environments in preparation for real-world applications.
